comment: Sometimes on her show I would hear something that should be aired at AM in the morning NOT PM!! Back in Phoenix. Is that show even on in Vegas? If so I haven't seen it and I never know if I want to.

            :frequency (s2 / sometimes)

            :snt3 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (s3 / show-04

                        :mod (e / even)

                  :op2 (h2 / have-condition-91

                              :ARG1 (s6 / show-04
                                    :mod (t / that)))
                        :op2 (k / know-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 ii3
                              :ARG1 (t2 / truth-value
                                    :polarity-of (w / want-01
                                          :ARG0 ii3
                                          :ARG1 s6))

                  :ARG1-of h2
                  :ARG2 s6)))
